ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hello, I am back!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No, it only tints items with visible grapgics. But if you dye your hand slot green and gloves with a graphic that you put in there will show as green.
ygData.messageBody:
STG2 Pierce wrote:
> I see..ok heres a question for you, say you dye your handslot green
> for example then you go and changeout the item you had on your hand
> to something without a graphic like silver chitin handwraps, will the
> green still show up?

No, it only tints items with visible grapgics. But if you dye your hand
slot green and gloves with a graphic that you put in there will show as
green.

Honig Wayfarer
65 Forest Stalker
Cazic Thule
